metadata.title: USN-4963-1 -- Pillow vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that Pillow incorrectly handled certain image files. If a user or automated system were tricked into opening a specially-crafted file, a remote attacker could cause Pillow to crash or hand, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4963-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-pil.imagetk - 7.0.0-4ubuntu0.4 python-pil-doc - 7.0.0-4ubuntu0.4 python3-pil - 7.0.0-4ubuntu0.4 No subscription required
